inventory.name: M0 Xtreme
inventory.description: The M0 Xtreme boasts the latest performance technology to help you cover ground quickly and efficiently. With a lightweight aluminium frame and durable suspension forks, this mountain bike is up for any terrain.

inventory.name: M1 Electra
inventory.description: The M1 Electra is the perfect solution to your daily commute. This electric bicycle has a powerful battery that goes for 50 km on one full charge. The charging time is only 1 hour, so you don't have to worry about it running out of juice. Fun and affordable transportation, just what you need.

inventory.name: M2 QT
inventory.description: The M2 QT is a charming city bike. With a range of frame colors, the cutie is suitable for everyone. It's easy to mount and even easier to ride. Foldable and with an anti-theft lock, it's perfect for all your daily commutes.
